title: Ball Sports - Sound Effects
description: More than 100 High quality audio files for your sport game! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This pack was created to sound out sports games that use ball! Such as football, basketball, baseball, ping pong, and many others!


This pack also has cheering sounds and score points sounds to take the player's immersion to another level, and from there you can bring your game to life.


These sounds were all recorded with real objects, soccer balls, basketball, ping pong, whistles and objects in that sense.


It is worth remembering that I made them with the theme of sports games, but if you have a game in another style that these effects will serve, I can think of a puzzle for example, you can use it without problem!


By investing in this package you take all that and help me to continue creating quality sound effects at a very nice price!


Check a possible usage

Check the Preview

Check the Documentation


Here's the Full List:


  • BallPump
  • Ball_Hit_Foot_Ball_Beam
  • Baseball_Hit_v1
  • Baseball_Hit_v2
  • BasketBall
  • Basket_Cest
  • Bugle
  • Crowd
  • Defeat
  • Kick_FootBall_v1
  • Kick_FootBall_v2
  • Kick_FootBall_v3
  • Marble_Ball_Hit
  • Marble_Hit_Drop
  • Miss_Shot
  • Shoe_Whistle_v1
  • Shoe_Whistle_v2
  • Shoe_Whistle_v3
  • Snooker_Ball_Hit
  • Snooker_Multiple_Balls_Hit
  • Snooker_Score
  • Table_Tennis
  • Table_Tennis_Hit_Net_v1
  • Table_Tennis_Hit_Net_v2
  • Victory
  • Whistle
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 107

Number of Audio Cues: 107

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) Just the "Crowd only talking" and "Crowd"

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) No

Mac: (Yes/No) No

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the images are distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay and unsplash.
